
DEPTH           = 58;         -- The size of memory in words
WIDTH           = 32;         -- The size of data in bits
ADDRESS_RADIX   = HEX;        -- The radix for address values
DATA_RADIX      = HEX;        -- The radix for data values
CONTENT                       -- start of (address : data pairs)

BEGIN

00: 4D000310 01: 00000000 02: E4000000
03: 4D000310 04: 01000000 05: D0050000
06: 4D000310 07: 02000000 08: 39050000
09: 4D000310 0A: 03000000 0B: 42010000
0C: 4D110010 0D: 8F000000 0E: 01000000
0F: 4D000010 10: 80000000 11: 04000000
12: 4D010010 13: 81000000 14: 00000000
15: 4D020010 16: 82000000 17: 00000000
18: 4D031020 19: 83000000 1A: 81000000
1B: 4D042020 1C: 84000000 1D: 82000000
1E: 43040300
1F: 47000000 20: 0B000000
21: 4D0F1020 22: 8F000000 23: 81000000
24: 4D012220 25: 81000000 26: 82000000
27: 4D02F200 28: 82000000 29: 8F000000
2A: 41021102
2B: 43020000
2C: 45000000 2D: 04000000
2E: 4A000000 2F: EAFFFFFF
30: 41011101
31: 43010000
32: 45000000 33: 04000000
34: 4A000000 35: E1FFFFFF


36: 4A000000 37: 00000000
38: 4A000000 39: FEFFFFFF

END;
